text: Amikhan Jisu laga kotha hunibo, jun biswas shuru kora aru thik kori diya ekjon ase. Kelemane kun pora Tai laga age te thaka khushi dikhi kene, Cross te mori bole bhi manise loise, sorom bhi khaise, aru etu pichete Isor laga singhason usorte dyna hathte bohise12.2 1 Pet. 2:23-24; Tit. 2:13-14..
